data.message:
This is a milestone in the way we view our constantly changing world. Facebook is a major leader in this movement and I think FB will remain such for many years to come. I remember when they first started working on this project. To see its success brings me tears of joy because it is uniting humanity! Kudos Facebook!

P.S. The flying wing is awesome!

replies.message: Thanks for the kind words, JD! We're glad you like it. -Ali
Awsome!
Let's see if they censor or restrict access to things they don't agree with before we start slapping them on the back and praising them.
Makes me smile.

Glad you are optimistic, I like this idea as well, and am hopeful for us to be able to enjoy things like this for years.. But, reality proves we don't have years to enjoy anything now, this world is coming to an end.. Well, humanity and civilization is, the world isn't.  And sorry to say but Facebooks top people are playing a major role in that, helping people become sheep.. Just wanted to get that out there, but live this idea and people are amazing for creating this 💯

this is a wonderful thing that is being done . with that said i have to agree with Tony ^^^ SHingTF is real , i wish it was not  ,May God help us all because this country is a ticking time bomb ! it is the devils world right now ,beware he and his demons are real ,hold tight to The Cross in the times to come !
Fantastic accomplishment now we must step forward and help to change the world
Seems like the more we try to bring the world together the worse it becomes. think sometimes there is time and distance between nations for a reason.
Bobby Davis, that is sad but true.

We got along better when we weren't so connected. I thought racism was over but the media is constantly throwing it out there. We can scroll down from one angering article to another. I've caught myself staying angry by so much negativity I unfollowed some sights. Everybody is in everybody's business. I know it's our responsibility to censor what we see and hear but the hatred is everywhere, even worldwide.
It's definitely a major part of speeding up evolution.
M we don't have control over future of the world disaster is going to occur all over the place

Thank you.😇 Facebook it really means a lot to us ,, through fbooking we have a connection to our family and friends throughout the world. Praise God for giving us  Wisdom and knowledge to invent this kind of  technology.
It's old technology is you really think about it. Ancient Egyptians had is figured out!
I agree that fb brings people together😍 Love it!!
It's great to know that you are improving the network thank you facebook
Greater Tomarrow
great invention of modern technology for humanity
Re-uniting lost communities. That's the best asset FB has and is so incredibly successful at it. Bringing worlds together???  GO FOR IT!!
Makes me sad.
Yay glad Facebook stuck by its word and made it happen.. ;)

There's pro's and cons to everything in life.  That being said, I believe Facebook was created with the best of intentions.   It's not Facebook that posts all the hate and negativity, it's the people.  If you stop responding to the hate and such,then you are doing what you can to eliminate the bad.  Good job Facebook🏆
